Introduction

VIXX is a four-member boy group under Jellyfish Entertainment. Originally as six, they debuted on May 24th, 2012, with the single album ‚ÄúSuper Hero‚Äù. The members of VIXX are N, Leo, Ken, and Hyuk. After competing in MyDOL, a survival show aired by Mnet, the members were selected through a public voting system. Their group name "VIXX" is an acronym for ‚ÄúVoice, Visual, Value in Excelsis‚Äù. However, On August 7th, 2020, Hongbin departed from the group, followed by Ravi on April 11th, 2023.

On March 3rd, 2024, Jellyfish announced that Ken and Leo's contracts have ended and they have left the company, although they have expressed their desire to continue promoting as VIXX with Jellyfish.
